title: What is Machine Learning – or How Does Google Translate Work?
dc:creator: Florian Hartl
description:
Next to my interest for Cloud Computing, I recently started to focus more and more on Machine Learning and became passionate about it. To me, it is a truly fascinating field of work! However, when I talk to friends, more often than not they don’t have a clear understanding of Machine Learning: yes, it is about making computers smart. But, other than that? For example: how does it work in general and what are some use cases? Even in the Silicon Valley, when I introduce myself as a Machine Learning Engineer, people sometimes ask me to explain it in more detail.…

The post What is Machine Learning – or How Does Google Translate Work? appeared first on Florian Hartl.
